channel.title: Crimes you were ever charged with
channel.description:
I've been gone for awhile due to being in prison for 11 days and house arrest, I have 12 months of probation left for 2 Counts of theft, possession of narcotics having a firearm underage without a permit and resisting arrest.
So what crimes have you guys done and got in trouble for?
It doesn't have to be like arrested, you could have been kicked out of school.. but nothing lower than that.
Anyway, I want to see some interesting stories here so lets get it going. :D

item.title: Crimes you were ever charged with
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Possesion of a concealed firearm, also having it underage

I was in a vacant home and was breaking walls, I forget what they called it

Threatening a police officer, but that didn’t count for much

Read full topic

P.S. I smell bullshit[/quote]

it really was that bud light or corona.

item.title: Crimes you were ever charged with
item.dc:creator: @SpamRex SpamRex
item.description:
@SpamRex wrote:

Well let’s see, in 6th grade I pissed in the teachers water and watched as she drank it, god damn that was a funny sight.
I cracked a kids head with a baseball bat.
I stabbed a girl with a pencil, she was in the hospital for 2 days.
I shot some random guy in the face with a pellet gun, messed up his left eye.
I egged a police station.
I broke into a liquor store and took 5 cases of miller high life.
and that’s just about all I can think of.

Read full topic
item.source: Crimes you were ever charged with

item.title: Crimes you were ever charged with
item.dc:creator: @o_town_reaper o_town_reaper
item.description:
@o_town_reaper wrote:

I have a felony theft for stealing $4,051 from my old work, i have mis-use of a dangerous weapon for stabing a kid at school in the lunch room because someone bet me a dollar i wouldnt do it, and i have a disorderly conduct for telling a teach to f*** off

item.source: Crimes you were ever charged with

item.title: Crimes you were ever charged with
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I don’t think this is a charging, but sometime last year I got in a fight at a party with some kid in Year 11. I broke his nose and fractured his cheek-bone with a head kick. It went to the police, I was interviewed and stuff. But I didn’t get charged I don’t think. As far as I know it was put on my record, but I wasn’t actually fined because I did it out of self-defense (witnesses stated he started on me).

Read full topic

Might still be on your perm record tho.

it stays here im pretty sure.
[/quote]

I stuck a fricken screw driver in a power outlet when i was 10 o.o[/quote]
